#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define p(n) printf("%d\n",n)
#define mod 1000000007LL
#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define LN 21
using namespace std;
/*void update(int idx,int val)
{
 while(idx<=maxval)
 {
  bit[idx]+=val;
  idx+=(idx & -idx);
 }
}
int query(int idx)
{
 int sum=0;
 while(idx>0)
 {
   sum+=bit[idx];
   idx-=(idx & -idx);
 }
 return sum;
}*/
struct T
{
 int id;
 int l,r;
 int blo;
}query[100001];
int ans[100002],a[200005];
bool compare(const struct T &a,const struct T &b)
{
 if(a.blo==b.blo)
 return a.r<b.r;
 else
 return a.blo<b.blo;
}
int main()
{
  int dp[21][21],i,j,k,l,t;
  for(i=1;i<=20;++i)
  dp[i][1]=dp[1][i]=1;
  for(i=0;i<=20;++i)
  dp[0][i]=dp[i][0]=0;
  for(i=2;i<=20;++i)
  for(j=2;j<=20;++j)
  {
    int mex[201];
    memset(mex,0,sizeof(mex));
    for(k=1;k<=i;++k)
    for(l=1;l<=j;++l)
    {
      int val=dp[k-1][l-1]^dp[k-1][j-l]^dp[i-k][l-1]^dp[i-k][j-l];
      mex[val]=1;
    }
    int nim=0;
    while(mex[nim])
    nim++;
    dp[i][j]=nim;
  }
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
  {
   int n,m;
   cin>>n>>m;
   if(dp[n][m])
   cout<<"Alice\n";
   else
   cout<<"Bob\n";
  }
return 0;
}
